publicationStmt.p: Published by The Confederation Debates project.

sourceDesc.p: This is a born-digital file based on original research.

prefixDef.p: Links to bibliography items are handled through the "bibl" prefix.

taxonomy.n: Taxonomy of legislatures, appointed bodies, and negotiations, whose proceedings form part of our dataset.

gloss.seg: The House of Commons
Chambre des communes

category.desc: The Canadian Federal House of Commons.

category.gloss: Province of Canada Legislative Assembly Assemblée législative de la province du CanadaDébats de l'Assemblée législative de la Province du Canada sur la Confédération
category.desc: The Legislative Assembly of the Province of Canada (Ontario and Québec constituting a single colony).

gloss.seg: Province of Canada Legislative Council
Débats du Conseil législatif de la Province du Canada sur la Confédération

category.desc: The Legislative Council of the Province of Canada (Ontario and Québec constituting a single colony).

gloss.seg: Legislative Council of British Columbia
Débats du Conseil législatif de la Colombie-Britannique sur la Confédération

category.desc: An advisory body created in 1867 to advise the governor of the new BC colony.

gloss.seg: Legislative Assemblies of Alberta and Saskatchewan
l'Assemblées législatives d'Alberta et Saskatchewan.

category.desc: [Awaiting description]

gloss.seg: The Convention of 40 / La Grande Convention
Le Conseil des 40 au sujet de la Confédération

category.desc: [Awaiting description]

gloss.seg: Legislative Assembly of Assiniboia
l'Assemblée législative d'Assiniboia
Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick
Débats de l'Assemblée législative du Nouveau-Brunswick sur la Confédération

category.desc: Assembly created initially in 1786 for the new colony, now the Provincial assembly.

gloss.seg: Legislative Assembly of Nova Scotia
Débats de l'Assemblée législative de la Nouvelle-Écosse sur la Confédération

category.desc: The oldest assembly in Canada, the NS House of Assembly first sat in 1858.

gloss.seg: Legislative Assembly of Prince Edward Island
Débats de l'Assemblée législative de l'Île-du-Prince-Édouard sur la Confédération

category.desc: The PEI legislature originated with a bicameral structure in 1773.

gloss.seg: Legislative Assembly of Newfoundland
Débats de l'Assemblée législative de Terre-Neuve sur la Confédération

category.desc: The NF House of Assembly was established in 1832 and sat until 1934 when responsible government was terminated.

gloss.seg: National Convention of Newfoundland
Débats de la Convention nationale de Terre-Neuve sur la Confédération

category.desc: The National Convention was formed by elected officials who met between 1946 and 1948 to investigate Newfoundland and Labrador's future.

gloss.seg: Treaties
Traités

category.desc: Treaty documents

gloss.seg: Treaty Negotiation
Négociation de traité

category.desc: Treaty negotiations (as decribed for example by Morris) are records of meetings between Indigenous and Crown leaders to develop and / or renew relationships between these Peoples.

taxonomy.n: Taxonomy of legislature topics by legislature, where a topic is typically the confederation of one province.

div.p: This is primarily a metadata file with key data in the teiHeader.
